column5: Hi all,  I have 2 shimano stradic reels that are in need of repair/tune up. I thought about sending them to the reel repair depot at shimano out peterborough way but then thought there has to be someone reputable out my way in guelph. So I am looking for any suggestions.  Thanks, Mark
I met this guy in Paris About a year ago.. give him a shout and see...Elwood Philips 519-442-3771 Don't know what he is like but he sound pretty good
